title: Cracked Dungeon Bricks
summaries: Cracked Dungeon Bricks are blocks which can be found in the Dungeon and appear very similar to ordinary Dungeon Bricks. If jumped on, walked across, grappled to, mined with any pickaxe or drill, or hit by projectiles, several Cracked Dungeon Bricks nearby the targeted block, including the block itself, may fall and be destroyed upon hitting solid ground, dropping no item. Cracked Dungeon Bricks can conceal important pathways to significant portions of the Dungeon, potentially making it seem much smaller than it actually is. Additionally, naturally-generated Cracked Dungeon Bricks often conceal rectangular pits lined with Spikes, which may sometimes be filled with water to make escape more difficult.

Cracked Dungeon Bricks can be crafted with regular Dungeon Bricks at a <linked>Heavy Work Bench</linked>. Crafted Cracked Dungeon Bricks behave the same as naturally generated Cracked Dungeon Bricks, and do not drop an item upon destruction.
